column4: Hey guys i have a really noobish problem. I have a file on my Hard drive that i cannot access because "im not the owner" how do i give myself privalages?
i installed apache, PHP and Mysql using terminal and the WWW file is unaccessible
what happens when you open localhost in your browser?
why are you writing to the WWW folder (what ever WWW means)
do you understand permissions in a *nix environment?
you probably want to setup a /home/user/public_html dir
no one, usually runs websites directly in /var/www
copy the single line in the channel please
doesnt help that your the only one who can see it
please dont paste more than one line at a time
then why are you setting up a webserver without any reading?
